[[File:Very Cool Blossom Hoodie Promo.jpg|thumb|An image used to promote the collaboration.]]
'''Very Cool''' (also referred to as '''Cool Shirtz''') is a clothing company that collaborated with [[Mojang Studios]] on a ''[[Minecraft]]''-themed collection. The collection was revealed on November 16, 2025 and the first wave was released on November 23, 2025.<ref>[https://x.com/coolshirtz/status/1990147341786206574?s=20 Cool Shirtz ðŸŒˆ on ''X'': "A World Awaits."]</ref><ref>[https://x.com/coolshirtz/status/1992412575963951420?s=20 Cool Shirtz ðŸŒˆ on ''X'': "18 Hours. ðŸŒ¸"]</ref>

== Trivia ==

* Thirteen days before the collaboration was announced, the Cool Shirtz social media manager gave a tour of their ''Minecraft'' world in a Twitter thread.<ref>[https://x.com/coolshirtz/status/1985353570007630324 Cool Shirtz ðŸŒˆ on ''X'': "ok since this got 23 likes im gonna go ahead and assume you guys want a full tour of my minecraft world"]</ref>
** The name of the owner's [[armadillo]], "sock", was the answer to a question in the Minecraft x Very Cool Sweepstakes.<ref>[https://gleam.io/7DtBH/minecraft-x-very-cool-sweepstakes "Minecraft x Very Cool Sweepstakes"] - gleam.io</ref>
